thread.title: Beyonce Officially Cancels Coachella Headlining Performances After Pregnancy Announcement - Beyoncé Reschedules Coachella
thread.title_full: Beyonce Officially Cancels Coachella Headlining Performances After Pregnancy Announcement - Beyoncé Reschedules Coachella

author: Peggy Truong
title: Beyonce Officially Cancels Coachella Headlining Performances After Pregnancy Announcement - Beyoncé Reschedules Coachella
text: Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Some 10 days after performing on the Grammys with her beautiful baby bump , Beyoncé has cancelled her upcoming headlining gig at Coachella, originally set for two weekends in April. The news was confirmed by Parkwood Entertainment and festival producer Goldenvoice in a joint statement that said Beyoncé is "following the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months" (via The Associated Press ). Most Popular While ticket holders who have already picked out Vanessa Hudgens-inspired outfits and camping gear for this year will likely cry rivers in the coming days, those with expendable/unlimited income can look forward to 2018 because that's when Beyoncé will actually perform. A replacement for Beyoncé has yet to be announced but Radiohead and Kendrick Lamar are still a go as fellow headliners. Beyoncé announced that her family was "growing by two" in a beautiful Instagram post shared on Feb. 1. Everyone lost it . A post shared by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:39am PST Follow Marie Claire on F acebook for the latest celeb news, beauty tips, fascinating reads, livestream video, and more.
